activities: We are a music record label. We receive personal information in two cases on our site - 1. artists applying to record with us, in which case we receive musician contact details, curriculum, and demos. And 2. customers purchasing digital downloads of our albums from our site, in which case we receive email addresses, addresses, and names. 3. Users uploading and publicly displaying their personal biographies on our platform B.io.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Films Videos & Other Recordings - (FLM)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)General Services - (GSV)
recoursemech: cooperation with EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
